testcase.system-out: Given User goes to login page...............................................passed When user enters a valid username and password..............................passed Then User logs in...........................................................passed And User navigates to my operations dropdown................................passed And User clicks on the manage customers.....................................passed And User clicks on create a new customer button.............................passed When User enters as a state as "" in US.....................................passed And User clicks on the save button..........................................passed Then System should display warning message for requirement.................passed
